ue4

Class Chicken

  • java.lang.Object
    • ue4.Animal
      • ue4.Pet
        • ue4.Chicken

  • public class Chicken
extends ue4.Pet
    This class generates a chicken. It inherits from class Pet.
    Author:
    Paul Jureschek, Michael Kinzkofer

        Generates Chicken object.

        color - color of chicken
        age - age of chicken
        name - name of chicken
        owner - owner of chicken
        isCackling - whether chicken is cackling or not
        eggsLaid - number of eggs the chicken has already laid

               ue4.World world)
        Generates Chicken object.
        Parameters:
        row - String that contains all necessary information
        world - world object the chicken is living on

    • Method Detail

      • performAction

        public void performAction()
        Chicken will lay an egg. Must have been cackling before. eggsLayed will be incremented if successful.
        Specified by:
        performAction in class ue4.Animal
